column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou get more critical hits
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\nクリティカルヒットの確率が増加

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou won't drown when submerged.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n浸水した時に溺れない

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou gain double the gold per nugget.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n1つの金塊につき、2倍ゴールドを獲得する。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\n4x instead of 2x gold is dropped when death is an accident.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n死亡が事故によって起こった場合、2倍ではなく4倍のゴールドが落とされる。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou can fly 100% longer.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n100%更に長く飛ぶことができる。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYour movement speed is increased.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n移動速度が増加される。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nStains drop at a fast rate (when moving).
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\nシミが速い速度で落ちる(移動時)。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nEnemies explode upon death.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n敵が死亡時に爆発する。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nIf you would die and have more than 1 HP, your HP is set to 1 instead.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\nあなたが死にそうでHPが1以上ある場合、HPが1に設定される。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou're invisible. Stains, casting spells, kicking and taking damage makes you temporarily visible.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n透明になる。シミ、呪文詠唱、蹴り、ダメージを受けることでこの効果が一時的に取り除かれる。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nBlood blood blood.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n血、血、血。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nPain is inevitable, but damage flash is optional.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n痛みを避けることはできないが、肉の破損は任意。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nInstead of slowing you down, slime allows you to move faster.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n移動速度が遅くなる代わりに、このスライムのおかげで移動速度が速くなる。

column2: ==This perkmight possibly be something like the following==\nYou gain 50% extra maximum health.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n50%の追加最大ヘルス。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYour spells deal 5x damage and have larger blast ranges, but your maximum health is capped to 50.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\nあなたの呪文が5倍ダメージを与え、更に大きな爆破範囲に広がるが、最大ヘルスが50に制限される。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nUpon death you respawn with 100 health.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n死亡時に100ヘルスで再出現する。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou take no damage from fire.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n火からダメージを受けることがなくなる。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou take no damage from toxic sludge.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n猛毒ヘドロからダメージを受けることがなくなる。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou take no direct damage from explosions.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n爆破から直接ダメージを受けることがなくなる。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou take no damage from close-range enemy attacks.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n敵による近距離の攻撃からダメージを受けることがなくなる。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou take no damage from electric shocks.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n電撃ショックからダメージを受けることがなくなる。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou take 20% less damage. You teleport away every time you're hurt.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\nダメージが20%減少する。毎回ダメージを受けるごとに、あなたがテレポートする。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou take 50% less damage as long as you have no active stain status effect.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nA divine blessing allows you to tinker with wands everywhere.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n神の祝福により、どこにいても杖を改良することができるようになる。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYour spells home towards enemies very slightly.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n全ての呪文が、少しだけ敵の方に向かって行く。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nLiquids freeze in your presence.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n周辺の液体を凍らせる。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nSand and other soft, powdery materials dissolve quickly in your presence.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n砂やその他の細かな粉素材は、あなたがいると素早く溶解する。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou gain a small, permanent shield.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n小さいが、永久のシールドを獲得する。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nWhen you take damage, you release a magical explosion that hurts enemies around you.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\nあなたがダメージを受ける時に、周囲にいる敵にダメージを与える魔法の爆破を引き起こす。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou're immune to electric damage, but metal and liquids around you electrify constantly. Look out!
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\nあなたは電撃ダメージに対して免疫を持っているが、周辺の鉄や液体は絶えず感電する。気を付けて！

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nIt breaks easily.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n簡単に壊れる。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYour maximum HP is doubled, but you take 20% more damage from projectiles.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\nあなたの最大HPは2倍になっているが、放射物によるダメージが20%増になる。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nThe less HP you have, the more damage your spells deal, up to +300% extra damage.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\nHPが少ないほど、あなたの呪文が与えるダメージが増え、最大で300%増の追加ダメージになる。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nAll your wands are replaced with random wands of approximately equal power.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou gain a selection of 2 powerful spells.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n瞬時に2種類の強力な呪文を獲得する。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nLiquids don't affect your movement at all.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n液体はあなたの移動に全く影響を与えない。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou swim faster.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n水泳速度が速くなる。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nThere will be an additional item in every Holy Mountain you haven't discovered yet.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\nまだ行った事のない聖なる山すべてに追加アイテムが加わる。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYour projectiles have a chance to ignite poisoned enemies.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\nあなたの放射物が毒に侵された敵に点火する可能性がある。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYour movement is floatier and you can jump and fly higher.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou can destroy the environment more effectively.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYour spells damage nearby enemies even if they don't hit them.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYour kicks instantly kill most foes, and push objects more.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou can see more into the darkness.

column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n暗闇はないが、敵が常にあなたの居場所を知るようになる。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nEnemies can no longer knock you back.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nEnemies have a chance of dropping a random potion upon death.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nSomething may hatch from it!

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nPotions you find contain double the liquid.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nCreatures take increased damage from poison and other liquids, fire, and more.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n敵が毒やその他液体、火などから増加したダメージを受ける。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nAll your wands gain extra damage but become uncustomizable.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nAll spells in your inventory are replaced with a random spell.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nAn orb flies near you and attacks your enemies.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou can carry one extra wand.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\n追加の杖スロットを1つ獲得する。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou can carry one extra item.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou gain more room for spells

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nEnemies with low health may start fighting for you.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou can fly forever, but standing on the ground deals you damage over time.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nBomb-like spells can be placed in the ITEMS space in inventory and used like throwable items.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nHearts bestow double the maximum health.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nFrom now on you will find an extra perk in every Holy Mountain.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nWhen you pick a perk, there's a 50% chance the others won't disappear.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nCreatures become more aggressive towards each other.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nCreatures become more friendly towards each other.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou're allies with a random enemy group.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou can see everywhere.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYour kicks deal extra damage and knockback.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\nキックのダメージが増加し、ノックバック効果が加わる。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nMost projectiles are repulsed by your presence, but you take slightly more projectile damage.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou bleed slime, but slime no longer slows you down.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYour HP has been multiplied but you can no longer regain HP.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nGold that you've seen no longer disappears over time.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nKnockback does not affect you.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYour spells knock enemies around with more force.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nAlmost all your spells bounce around.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nAlmost all your spells arc towards you. You gain higher projectile resistance.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nWorms find you attractive.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nWorms run from you.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou are an expert swimmer!

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou call a monstrous tentacle against those who harm you.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou grow curious additional limbs that fight for you.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nEnemies that die near you summon hungry rats to serve your bidding.
column11: ==この特典はおそらく以下の説明文のようなものです==\nあなたの側で敵が死ぬと、あなたの命令で動く飢えたネズミが召喚される。

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou can sense nearby enemies.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou bleed flammable gas instead of blood.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou constantly fire a devastating plasma beam, but you fire spells much slower

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou can no longer drown, and can move in liquids with ease.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nYou no longer suffer from negative effects of eating.

column2: ==This perk might possibly be something like the following==\nSome explosions can be amplified to vast proportions through the use of additional perks.
